summary: The diff shows only one file was meaningfully modified: `frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts`, which correctly implements REQ-1. However, REQ-2 through REQ-6 require updates to `squareFeetCalculator.ts`, `pdfGenerator.ts`, `DoorEntryList.tsx`, `GrandTotals.tsx`, `QuotationActions.tsx`, and `whatsappShare.ts` â€” none of which appear in the diff as modified files. The project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt show all new feature requests are still marked 'pending', confirming the implementation is incomplete.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/utils/squareFeetCalculator.ts` to apply rounding rules from `dimensionRounding.ts` before computing square footage using formula (roundedHeight x roundedWidth) / 144.
missing_requirements.reason: `squareFeetCalculator.ts` does not appear in the diff as a modified file. The project state marks AR-3 as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts` to display actual dimensions in the PDF table while computing amounts using rounded square footage.
missing_requirements.reason: `pdfGenerator.ts` does not appear in the diff as a modified file. The project state marks AR-4 as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure `DoorEntryList.tsx` and `GrandTotals.tsx` display only actual entered dimensions while computing amounts using rounded square footage via updated `squareFeetCalculator.ts`.
missing_requirements.reason: Neither `DoorEntryList.tsx` nor `GrandTotals.tsx` appear in the diff as modified files for this purpose. The project state marks AR-5 as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure `QuotationActions.tsx` and `whatsappShare.ts` produce WhatsApp share text with actual dimensions but amounts computed using rounded square footage.
missing_requirements.reason: Neither `QuotationActions.tsx` nor `whatsappShare.ts` appear in the diff as modified files for this purpose. The project state marks AR-6 as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify rounding rules are applied uniformly across all four coating types in a coating-type-agnostic manner.
missing_requirements.reason: Without the `squareFeetCalculator.ts` update (REQ-2), the rounding cannot be applied to any coating type calculations. Project state marks AR-7 as 'pending'.

hallucinated_features.description: DoorEntryForm.tsx was updated to use the new `roundDimensions` combined function at the form/display layer.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request states rounded dimensions must never be displayed to the user and rounding should only be used internally in calculations. Applying rounding in `DoorEntryForm.tsx` was not requested and may expose rounded values at the UI entry level, contradicting the constraints.
